post0.title: Quiz 2
post0.content: QuizDb = [] # Dhruva's Info QuizDb.append({ "Firstname": "Dhruva", "Lastname": "Iyer", "Age": "15", "Height": "68 inches" }) # Kanishka's Info QuizDb.append({ "Firstname": "Kanishka", "Lastname": "Iyer", "Age": "13", "Weight": "80 pounds" }) . def ask_questions(QDb): correct_cnt = 0 total_cnt = 0 for dict_item in QDb: person_name = dict_item['Firstname'] for key in dict_item: if key == 'Firstname': continue else: question = "what is " + person_name + "'s " + key correct_answer = dict_item[key] user_answer = input(question) if user_answer == "exit": break total_cnt += 1 if correct_answer == user_answer: correct_cnt += 1 print("Your answer is correct") else: print("Your answer is incorrect") if user_answer == "exit": print("Bye!") break print('you answered: ', correct_cnt, '/', total_cnt) ask_questions(QuizDb) . Your answer is correct Your answer is correct Your answer is correct Bye! you answered: 3 / 3 . .

post1.title: Python Hacks
post1.content: InfoDb = [] # Append to List a Dictionary of key/values related to a person and cars InfoDb.append({ "FirstName": "Dhruva", "LastName": "Iyer", "DOB": "June 8th", "Residence": "San Diego", "Email": "dhruvasiyer@gmail.com", "Owns_Cars": None }) InfoDb.append({ "FirstName": "Kanishka", "LastName": "Iyer", "DOB": "June 20th", "Residence": "San Diego", "Email": "kk@gmail.com", "Owns_Cars": None }) InfoDb.append({ "FirstName": "Ravi", "LastName": "Iyer", "DOB": "June 10th", "Residence": "San Diego", "Email": "rr@gmail.com", "Owns_Cars": ['r_car1', 'r_car2'] }) for rec in InfoDb: print(rec) print("next .....") . {'FirstName': 'Dhruva', 'LastName': 'Iyer', 'DOB': 'June 8th', 'Residence': 'San Diego', 'Email': 'dhruvasiyer@gmail.com', 'Owns_Cars': None} next ..... {'FirstName': 'Kanishka', 'LastName': 'Iyer', 'DOB': 'June 20th', 'Residence': 'San Diego', 'Email': 'kk@gmail.com', 'Owns_Cars': None} next ..... {'FirstName': 'Ravi', 'LastName': 'Iyer', 'DOB': 'June 10th', 'Residence': 'San Diego', 'Email': 'rr@gmail.com', 'Owns_Cars': ['r_car1', 'r_car2']} next ..... . # supported - summary/detailed def print_by_first_name(list_to_lookup, key_to_look, keyword, mode_info): if keyword == rec[key_to_look]: def print_by_first_name(list_to_lookup, firstname_key, mode_info): rec_found_flag = 0 for rec in list_to_lookup: if firstname_key == rec['FirstName']: rec_found_flag = 1 # record is found, now print depending on the mode if mode_info == 'summary': print(rec['FirstName']," ",rec['LastName']) elif mode_info == 'detailed': print(' Name: ', rec['FirstName']," ",rec['LastName']) print('Date of Birth: ', rec['DOB']) print(' Residence: ', rec['Residence']) else: print('record found but incorrect mode specified') if rec_found_flag == 0: print('record NOT found') print('test 1') print_by_first_name(InfoDb,'Ravi','summary') print('test 2') print_by_first_name(InfoDb,'Ravi','detailed') print('test_3') print_by_first_name(InfoDb,'Dhruva','dumb') print('test_4') print_by_first_name(InfoDb,'Dhruva1','dumb') . test 1 Ravi Iyer test 2 Name: Ravi Iyer Date of Birth: June 10th Residence: San Diego test_3 record found but incorrect mode specified test_4 record NOT found . correct_answer_tracker = 0 questions_to_ask = 0 questions_asked = 0 #Question 1 user_input_1 = input("What is Dhruva's DOB?") correct_answer_1 = "June 8th" questions_asked+=1 if user_input_1 == correct_answer_1: print("You are correct my friend") correct_answer_tracker+=1 else: print("Wrong answer") print("You answered", correct_answer_tracker,"/", questions_asked, "correct") . def ask_question(question_to_be_asked, correct_answer, correct_answers): user_input = input(question_to_be_asked) if user_input == correct_answer: print("You are correct") correct_answers+=1 else: print("Wrong answer") return correct_answers # the following code uses predefined Q/A pair to illustrate # using them for query list_of_QA = [ {'Question': "What is Dhruva's DOB?", 'Answer': "June 8th"}, {'Question': "What is Kanishka's DOB?", 'Answer': "June 20th"} ] correct_answer_tracker = 0 questions_to_ask = len(list_of_QA) questions_asked = 0 for item_in_QA in list_of_QA: correct_answer_tracker = ask_question(item_in_QA['Question'], item_in_QA['Answer'], correct_answer_tracker) questions_asked +=1 # Exception Handling if questions_asked != questions_to_ask: print("WARNING: not all questions asked...") print("You answered", correct_answer_tracker,"/", questions_asked) # the next example would show how to create questions out of user database . [{'FirstName': 'Dhruva', 'LastName': 'Iyer', 'DOB': 'June 8th', 'Residence': 'San Diego', 'Email': 'dhruvasiyer@gmail.com', 'Owns_Cars': None}, {'FirstName': 'Kanishka', 'LastName': 'Iyer', 'DOB': 'June 8th', 'Residence': 'San Diego', 'Email': 'dhruvasiyer@gmail.com', 'Owns_Cars': None}] Wrong answer Wrong answer You answered 0 / 2 .

post3.title: Python Quiz
post3.content: points = 0 answer = input("How many hours does the average person sleep?") if answer == "7": print("Correct answer!") points += 1 else: print("incorrect answer") print("The correct answer was 7") answer = input("When was the first iPhone made?") if answer == "2007": print("Correct answer!") points += 1 else: print("incorrect answer") print("The correct answer was 2007") answer = input("Who was the 16th President of the United States?") if answer == "Abraham Lincoln": print("Correct answer!") points += 1 else: print("incorrect answer") print("The correct answer was Abraham Lincoln") print("You got:", (points/3)*100, "%") . incorrect answer The correct answer was 7 incorrect answer The correct answer was 2007 incorrect answer The correct answer was Abraham Lincoln You got: 0.0 % .

post5.title: Bash Notebook
post5.content: echo "Using conditional statement to create a project directory and project" # Variable section export project_dir=$HOME/Bash_Notebook # change vscode to different name to test git clone export project=$project_dir/Fastpages # change APCSP to name of project from git clone export project_repo="https://github.com/DeDuva4/Fastpages.git" # change to project of choice cd ~ # start in home directory # Conditional block to make a project directory if [ ! -d $project_dir ] then echo "Directory $project_dir does not exists... makinng directory $project_dir" mkdir -p $project_dir fi echo "Directory $project_dir exists." # Conditional block to git clone a project from project_repo if [ ! -d $project ] then echo "Directory $project does not exists... cloning $project_repo" cd $project_dir git clone $project_repo cd ~ fi echo "Directory $project exists." . Using conditional statement to create a project directory and project Directory /home/deduva/Bash_Notebook exists.004l Directory /home/deduva/Bash_Notebook/Fastpages exists.4l . . echo "Navigate to project, then navigate to area wwhere files were cloned" cd $project pwd echo "" echo "list top level or root of files with project pulled from github" ls echo "" echo "list again with hidden files pulled from github" ls -a # hidden files flag, many shell commands have flags echo "" echo "list all files in long format" ls -al # all files and long listing . Navigate to project, then navigate to area wwhere files were cloned /home/deduva/Bash_Notebook/Fastpages list top level or root of files with project pulled from github 2022-05-15-07-21-16.png _config.yml _includes _notebooks _sass 2022-05-15-07-24-25.png docker-compose.yml index.html _pages _word 2022-05-15-07-25-15.png _fastpages_docs _layouts _plugins _action_files Gemfile LICENSE _posts assets images Makefile README.md list again with hidden files pulled from github . .devcontainer.json images _plugins .. docker-compose.yml _includes _posts 2022-05-15-07-21-16.png _fastpages_docs Navigate to project, then navigate to area wwhere files were cloned show the contents of README.md4l [//]: # (This template replaces README.md when someone creates a new repo with the fastpages template.) ![](https://github.com/DeDuva4/Fastpages/workflows/CI/badge.svg) ![](https://github.com/DeDuva4/Fastpages/workflows/GH-Pages%20Status/badge.svg) [![](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=fastai&message=fastpages&color=57aeac&labelColor=black&style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://github.com/fastai/fastpages) https://DeDuva4.github.io/Fastpages/ # My Blog _powered by [fastpages](https://github.com/fastai/fastpages)_ ## What To Do Next? Great! You have setup your repo. Now its time to start writing content. Some helpful links: - [Writing Blogs With Jupyter](https://github.com/fastai/fastpages#writing-blog-posts-with-jupyter) - [Writing Blogs With Markdown](https://github.com/fastai/fastpages#writing-blog-posts-with-markdown) - [Writing Blog Posts With Word](https://github.com/fastai/fastpages#writing-blog-posts-with-microsoft-word) - [(Optional) Preview Your Blog Locally](_fastpages_docs/DEVELOPMENT.md) Note: you may want to remove example blog posts from the `_posts`, `_notebooks` or `_word` folders (but leave them empty, don't delete these folders) if you don't want these blog posts to appear on your site. Please use the [nbdev & blogging channel](https://forums.fast.ai/c/fastai-users/nbdev/48) in the fastai forums for any questions or feature requests. end of README.md . .
